game.title: The Hero's Journey
game.description: You are a brave adventurer on a quest to defeat the evil dragon that terrorizes the land.

task.description: Travel to the ancient ruins and retrieve the legendary Sword of Light.
Battle the fearsome Cyclops in his cave.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the Dragon's Lair
task.description: Seek out the elusive entrance to the Dragon's Lair.
Confront the mighty dragon in its lair and slay it.
